'''Foreign Ironwind''' is [[Traveler (Anemo)]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*'''Foreign Ironwind''' is the [[Anemo]] version of [[Past Memories]].
*{{TalentNote|character=Traveler (Anemo)|talent=Foreign Ironwind|ascension|1|Slitting Wind}}
**The wind blade created by [[Slitting Wind]] is considered Normal Attack damage, and thus can trigger weapon passives such as those belonging to [[Prototype Rancour]] and [[Mistsplitter Reforged]].
